channel.title: AndroidX 634! Now in Alpha testing period!
channel.description:
[size=18pt]The server will be laggy, as I am already hosting a computer on my computer.[/size]
So I just started working on dementhium, so I decided to build upon it.
Currently I just added a ClanWars Pk Area. And I'm now working on Godwars. Here what already on the server and what I'm working on and what will be on.
[100%] Pk Areas: Clan Wars, Green drags, Edge [85%] Godwars [0% ] Soul Wars [0%] Npc Drops ( I know right? ) Can anyone open this rigged file please so i can edit it. and post a reply: [url=https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/drops.bin?w=3708bc70]https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/drops.bin?w=3708bc70[/url] [0%] PvP Drops [0%] Proper Login [1%] Dungeoneering
[b]Godwars Breakdown[/b]
-Main room [REMOVED] -Saradomin[X] -Bandos [X] -Arma [0%] -Zaros(AKA NEX) [X] -Zammy [X]
Just added Bandos, Still working on the altar. Also I still have to add KC room spawns. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2zqqubo.png[/img]
but that looks a bit screwed eh? So I decided to remove the minions and added the GFX for graardor and made him move around here: [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/25h2zif.png[/img]
[b]UPDATE 4: I don't know why but i cannot upload gifs to tinypic so i have to use youtube. It's got full animated k'ril and zilyana i cut it off a bit but its all animted [u][b]"http://www.youtube.com/embed/pUt4_Opa7wY"
[b]UPDATE 5: Decided to add Nex early - Still coding it's turm - but who gives? So far it's pretty awsome :D :D THERE IS NO ESCAAPEEE!!! :D :D http://www.youtube.com/embed/BYDfdQmwXNA[/b]
[i][u]MEMO 1: I've decided to add all of the godwars minions at once, then add the video/pics. I am NOT going to add the main room(maybe add in future) because at the moment, simple teleport to the boss room provides more simplicity. So i'll just get crackin'[/u][/i]
[b]UPDATE 6: Full Zamorak room, i died rather quickly o.O http://www.youtube.com/embed/aYMzgHe-Zjs[/b]

item.title: AndroidX 634! Now in Alpha testing period!
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

Gl on this, also, to solve your item drops, open up a notepad and paste

@echo off title Drop Editor java -cp bin;lib/*; org.dementhium.tools.DropEditor pause

=.=" atleast attempt to go through the files, and learn how to link a bat to run it :P. Anyways, save the file as “whateveryouwanthere.bat” (make sure it has the .bat). :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.description:
@ipwnunoobs wrote:

I fixed proper login, so people can now login without worrying about other people being on their account, even so Bank Pin (which was already on the base) will be staying as well.
Here are some pictures…
Incorrect Login

e1bxgw.png765×504

nvo3fq.png768×502

Correct Login
2hd1fzn.png764×503

2itof9v.png768×504

AND ALSO WE NOW HAVE HD!
AND ALSO YOU CAN PLAY ALPHA @ http://androidx.site90.net/634webclient.html
AND HAVE FUN

item.title: AndroidX 634! Now in Alpha testing period!
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“ipwnunoobs, post:7, topic:394350”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=491534.msg3594469#msg3594469 date=1304940810]
Your client resized looks really ugly.
[/quote]

It was in resizable mode but I restore downed it and it looks ugly, you’re a quick one to judge aren’t you?

We’re using same base… I wanna do something good with this too due to it has the Stability like Hyperion, (317), which is nice. + It’s a really empty base, so people won’t troll as much / say how it’s leached really…

If you wanna, would you care too team on this? I’d be willing too learn/teach you what I know and help you do like:

-> Quests
-> Dungeoneering Skill
-> Proper Interfaces
-> Report Abuse button ^^
-> Skills
-> Many more…

But I don’t wanna be the one doing all the work if you’d wanna team up ;o?

Yeah I would like to team up.
Would you like to split the work?

Plus i would want to really add the dungeoneering rooms[/quote]

Yea, same for the Dungeoneering skill, but we’d have to work on getting the Coords for the rooms, etc.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ipwnunoobs ipwnunoobs
item.description:
@ipwnunoobs wrote:

[size=18pt]The server will be laggy, as I am already hosting a computer on my computer.[/size]

So I just started working on dementhium, so I decided to build upon it.

Currently I just added a ClanWars Pk Area. And I’m now working on Godwars. Here what already on the server and what I’m working on and what will be on.

[100%] Pk Areas: Clan Wars, Green drags, Edge
[85%] Godwars
[0% ] Soul Wars
[0%] Npc Drops ( I know right? ) Can anyone open this rigged file please so i can edit it. and post a reply: https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/drops.bin?w=3708bc70
[0%] PvP Drops
[0%] Proper Login
[1%] Dungeoneering

Godwars Breakdown

-Main room [REMOVED]
-Saradomin[X]
-Bandos [X]
-Arma [0%]
-Zaros(AKA NEX) [X]
-Zammy [X]

Just added Bandos, Still working on the altar. Also I still have to add KC room spawns.

but that looks a bit screwed eh? So I decided to remove the minions and added the GFX for graardor and made him move around here:

25h2zif.png765×512

[b]UPDATE 4: I don’t know why but i cannot upload gifs to tinypic so i have to use youtube.
It’s got full animated k’ril and zilyana i cut it off a bit but its all animted
[u][b]“http://www.youtube.com/embed/pUt4_Opa7wY”

UPDATE 5: Decided to add Nex early - Still coding it’s turm - but who gives? So far it’s pretty awsome
THERE IS NO ESCAAPEEE!!!
http://www.youtube.com/embed/BYDfdQmwXNA

MEMO 1: I’ve decided to add all of the godwars minions at once, then add the video/pics. I am NOT going to add the main room(maybe add in future) because at the moment, simple teleport to the boss room provides more simplicity. So i’ll just get crackin’
